korean: 마감일이 이틀 남았는데, 아직 할 게 산더미야.
어제부터 야근하고 있는데, 오늘도 늦게까지 일해야 할 것 같아.
집중하려고 하는데, 자꾸 딴 생각이 나서 효율이 안 나.
커피를 벌써 네 잔째 마시는데, 속이 쓰려.
팀원들도 다 비슷한 상황이라, 다들 예민해져 있어.
작은 일에도 짜증 나는 게, 스트레스 받는 거 티 나.
점심도 대충 먹고 바로 일 시작했는데, 배고파.
진척이 잘 안 되는 것 같아서 불안해.
상사한테 진행 상황 보고해야 하는데, 뭐라고 말해야 할지 모르겠어.
일찍 끝내고 집에 가고 싶은데, 현실은 그게 아니야.
밤늦게까지 일하면 다음 날 아침이 더 힘들어.
이번 프로젝트 끝나면 좀 쉬고 싶은데, 또 다른 일이 들어올 것 같아.
데드라인 없는 삶을 살고 싶어, 진짜로.
english: The deadline is in two days, and I still have like, a mountain of work.
I've been working overtime since yesterday, and I think I'll have to work late again today.
I'm trying to focus, but I keep getting distracted so I'm not efficient.
I'm already on my fourth cup of coffee, and my stomach hurts.
My teammates are all in similar situations, so everyone's on edge.
Getting annoyed at small things, it's obvious I'm stressed.
I ate lunch quickly and started work right away, and I'm hungry.
I'm anxious because it doesn't seem like I'm making good progress.
I have to report progress to my boss, but I don't know what to say.
I want to finish early and go home, but reality isn't like that.
Working late into the night makes the next morning even harder.
When this project ends I want to rest, but I think another job will come in.
I want to live a life without deadlines, seriously.
But I have to get through it somehow, giving up isn't an option.
